title: BBC Local Live: Cambridgeshire on Tuesday, 17 November 2015 - BBC News
summary: police investigating the murder of peterborough six-year-old rikki neave say they have new leads .
risk of high winds as storm barney heads to east anglia this afternoon .
more news , sport , weather and travel updates from 08:00 on wednesday .

documents.title: that 's it from cambridgeshire live
text: goodbye from cambridgeshire live .
we 'll be back tomorrow from 08:00 with the latest news , sport , travel and weather updates for the county - and we 'll let you know if storm barney has caused any problems overnight .
you can send us your stories , and comments any time via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police 'excited ' by progress made in rikki neave murder investigation after crimewatch appeal
text: det supt paul fulwood from cambridgeshire police says the force is `` excited '' by the progress made following a crimewatch appeal to catch the killer of six-year-old rikki neave .
rikki 's body was found in woodland close to his home ( above ) on the welland estate in peterborough in november 1994 .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: headlines : rikki neave crimewatch calls 'significant ' storm barney brings high winds to cambridgeshire
text: here are the headlines in cambridgeshire this evening :
author: Emma Maclean
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: storm barney : yellow warning of high winds in place
text: a yellow weather warning is in place for cambridgeshire for high winds of up to 70mph until 02:00 on wednesday .
yellow means you should plan ahead , thinking about possible travel delays or the disruption of your day-to-day activities . ''
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: travel : high winds cause delays to virgin trains
text: high winds from storm barney have started having an effect .
virgin trains , which runs east coast services through peterborough , has announced delays on all services .
# vtecupdate due to high winds , delays of up to 40 mins are expected on all services for the rest of the day .
@ twitterid were on the 23:02 from newcastle to york .
it could be a late night !
hope the first class trolley is well stocked .
@ twitterid it hopefully wo n't be too bad chris .
^nb
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police called to reports of 'cannabis smell ' at ely school discover wildflowers
text: police called to an ely primary school today after reports of a strong cannabis smell discovered it was caused by wildflowers .
teachers and parents at rackham primary school reported the smell of cannabis `` wafting across the car park '' .
police say : `` there is n't cannabis production going on in that area - however there is a crop of a wildflower named phlox which has an almost identical smell '' .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: football : peterborough 's michael bostwick backs graham westley to recreate stevenage magic
text: midfielder michael bostwick believes manager graham westley will add silverware to peterborough united 's trophy cabinet .
bostwick won successive league titles playing under westley at stevenage between 2008 and 2012 .
posh are currently 10th in league one , having won five of nine matches since westley succeeded dave robertson back in september .
author: Peter Swan
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire sport

documents.title: armed police storm wrong building in cambridge - when they should have been at robbery in newmarket
text: armed police burst into an office building in cambridge - but they had got the wrong address and were about 15 miles from where an attempted robbery was taking place - in newmarket .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: rikki neave murder : crimewatch appeal calls 'significant ' say police
text: police investigating the 1994 murder of six-year-old rikki neave in peterborough say calls received following their appeal on crimewatch `` were significant '' .
det supt paul fulwood told bbc radio cambridgeshire they would be following up the 17 calls received `` today and over the next few days '' .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: about 200 people sign condolence book for victims of paris attacks
text: ely cathedral says about 200 people have signed a book of condolence for the victims of the attacks in paris since it was opened yesterday .
the so-called islamic state ( is ) group says it carried out the multiple attacks in which 129 people died .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: storm barney : selfie warning as high winds head to cambridgeshire
text: as storm barney heads to cambridgeshire people are being warned against posing for `` storm selfies '' .
the royal society for the prevention of accidents is urging people not to put themselves at risk capturing photographs of dramatic moments .
forecasters say winds up to 70mph ( 113km/h ) could strike the county this evening .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: headlines : detectives investigating murder of rikki neave receive 17 calls following crimewatch appearance storm barney heading for cambridgeshire
text: here are the top stories in cambridgeshire so far this afternoon :
author: Emma Maclean
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: weather : turning wet and very windy this afternoon
text: a band of heavy rain and winds will increase during the afternoon , with a risk of gales by dusk as storm barney moves across the uk .
maximum temperature : 16c ( 61f ) .
for the latest on storm barney go to bbc weather .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: cambridgeshire mum 's fundraising helps hospital buy state-of-the-art microscope
text: a neurosurgeon at addenbrooke 's in cambridge says a state-of-the-art microscope part- funded by a peterborough woman 's fundraising will `` improve the outcomes for patients '' .
louise clark ( over £ 20,000 for the addenbrooke 's charitable trust after her daughter holly died aged 22 from a brain tumour .
dr rikin trivedi told bbc radio cambridgeshire the new microscope is a `` very sophisticated bit of equipment '' which will help treat cancer patients .
author: Sam Edwards
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: rise in average salaries in peterborough outpaces hi-tech neighbour
text: average salaries for employees in peterborough have risen by 13 % over the last year - considerably outpacing the city 's hi-tech and high salary neighbour cambridge .
author: Peterborough Telegraph

documents.title: ricky neave murder : new possible sightings revealed by police
text: detectives investigating the murder of rikki neave in peterborough have revealed four new possible sightings of the six-year-old shortly before his death in 1994 .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: police return to welland after crimewatch rikki neave murder appeal
text: police say they will be in the welland area of peterborough `` all day '' following last night 's crimewatch appeal over the murder of six-year-old rikki neave .
rikki was last seen leaving his welland home to go to school on 28 november 1994 .
his body was found in woods a day later .
detectives say they believe the public `` hold the key '' to catching his killer .
author: Johnny Dee
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: 'vital ' £ 4.5m cycle bridge on ditton meadows gets go-ahead
text: a `` vital '' new £ 4.5m cycle and pedestrian bridgeover the river cam on ditton meadows has been given the go-ahead .
author: Cambridge News

documents.title: mystery ancestral 'tribe ' revealed by cambridge researchers
text: a previously unknown ancestral `` tribe '' that contributed tothe modern european gene pool has been uncovered by researchers from the university of cambridge .
scientific advances in recent years have allowed scientists to retrieve and analyse genomes from ancient burials - including a 10,000-year-old skeleton ( above ) from georgia .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: woman taken to hospital after being struck by a lorry on mill road in cambridge
text: we 've just heard a female cyclist in her 20s has been seriously injured after being struck by a lorry on mill road in cambridge .
cambridgeshire police say the victim has been taken to addenbrooke 's hospital with serious , but not life-threatening injuries .
the collision happened at mill road 's junction with hemingford road .
author: Tom Horn
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: yaxley crash : one man taken to hospital
text: a man in his 40s was taken to hospital with a suspected pelvis injury after a two vehicle crash in yaxley this morning .
the ambulance service was called to the a15 just after 07:00 .
the road has since reopened .
author: Tom Horn
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: headlines : detectives investigating murder of rikki neave receive 17 calls following crimewatch appearance storm barney heading for cambridgeshire
text: here are the top stories in cambridgeshire so far this morning :
author: Tom Horn
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: ricky neave murder : artist reconstructions released
text: police have released artist impressions of two men they are `` keen to identify '' in connection to the murder investigation of rikki neave in peterborough in 1994 .
if anyone recognises the people in the drawings , they have been asked to call police or crimestoppers .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: £ 10,000 reward offered to catch killer of rikki neave
text: police say a reward of up to £ 10,000 is on offer for information which leads to the arrest and conviction of rikki neave 's killer .
the charity crimestoppers has put up the reward in a bid to catch the person responsible for the murder of the peterborough six-year-old .
author: David Keller
BBC News

documents.title: ricky neave murder : police urge anyone with information to come forward
text: det ch insp richard wall has issued a statement , saying : `` any information , no matter how small or insignificant you believe it to be , could provide the missing link in helping us trace whoever is responsible for his murder . ''
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: watch the crimewatch reconstruction of rikki neave 's last-known movements
text: a reconstruction of six-year-old rikki neave 's last-known movements was shown on bbc 's crimewatch last night , along with interviews with his mother and sister .
police have just told us they have received a number of calls since the programme was aired and they 're chasing up new leads over his murder .
police are asking anyone with any information `` however small '' to contact them .
you can watch the crimewatch episode above .
author: David Keller
BBC News

documents.title: rikki neave murder : police receive 17 calls following crimewatch appeal
text: cambridgeshire police said they received 17 calls following the crimewatch appeal last night over the murder of six-year-old rikki neave in peterborough .
det ch insp richard wall said : `` we received a number of interesting calls following the reconstruction which we will be following up over the next few days '' .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: breakingrikki neave murder : police receive 'interesting calls ' after crimewatch appearance
text: detectives investigating the murder of rikki neave say they received 17 calls , a number of them `` interesting '' , following an appearance on bbc 's crimewatch last night .
more to follow .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: rikki neave murder : ruth neave says she has 'no doubt ' killer will be caught
text: the mother of murdered six-year-old rikki neave says she has `` no doubt '' his killer will be caught .
rikki was last seen leaving his home in redmile walk , welland , for school at about 08:30 on 28 november 1994 .
mother ruth neave told bbc look east she could `` never forgive herself '' for not taking him to school that day .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: football : alie sesay 's loan at cambridge united expires
text: we 're waiting to hear if alie sesay 's loan spell at cambridge united has been extended , after it officially ended yesterday .
the defender has been on loan at the u 's from premier league side leicester city for the past month , making six appearances .
sesay played for leicester 's u21 side yesterday , but could still feature for the u 's if an agreement is reached .
author: Sam Edwards
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: rikki neave murder : police say new witness has come forward
text: police investigating the murder six-year-old rikki neave revealed on bbc 's crimewatch that a new witness has reported a sighting in tilton court , peterborough , near to shops where the boy was last seen .
rikki 's body was found in woodland close to his home on the welland estate in peterborough in november 1994 .
a reconstruction of rikki 's last known movements was shown on the bbc one programme last night , along with interviews with his mother and sister .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: two car crash at yaxley closes a15 during morning rush hour
text: a two vehicle crash on waterslade road in yaxley closed the a15 in both directions this morning .
firefighters took this photo of one of the vehicles involved .
the road has since re-opened .
we 'll bring you more information as we get it .
author: Tom Horn
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: your french flag left on mathematical bridge
text: this french flag left on the famous mathematical bridge in cambridge was photographed by neil mackay .
news has the latest updates on the ongoing security operation following friday 's terrorist attacks in paris .
do n't forget , you can send us your .
for us to feature via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Mousumi Bakshi
BBC Radio Cambridgeshire

documents.title: weather : dry this morning , but turning wet and very windy
text: this morning will be mostly dry , but it will turn wet and very windy later as storm barney tracks across the uk .
maximum temperature : 16c ( 61f ) .
author: Kate Kinsella
BBC Look East weather

documents.title: rikki neave murder : police in crimewatch appeal reveal new leads
text: police investigating the cold case murder of six-year-old rikki neave in peterborough revealed on the bbc 's crimewatch last night they had new leads .
officers say a fresh witness reported seeing two youths with a boy on the night rikki was killed .

documents.title: 'be aware ' of barney : storm warning issued by met office
text: a `` be aware '' warning has been issued for cambridgeshire by the met office , when storm barney arrives here later today .
gusts in the county could reach 60-70mph between 15:00 and 23:30 today .
weather 's john hammond explains more .
author: BBC Weather

documents.title: headlines : detectives investigating the murder of rikki neave say they have got new leads storm barney heading for cambridgeshire
text: here are the main stories in cambridgeshire this morning :
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live

documents.title: welcome to cambridgeshire live
text: welcome to cambridgeshire live for tuesday , 17 november .
we 'll be be here again until 18:00 with the latest news , sport , travel and weather in the county as it happens .
you can send us your stories , and comments at any time via email , facebook or twitter .
author: Mark Williamson
BBC Local Live
